briefTitle: Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Fluticasone Furoate Inhalation Powder in the Treatment of Asthma in Adults and Adolescents
officialTitle: A Randomised, Double-blind, Double-dummy, Placebo Controlled (With Rescue Medication), Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Fluticasone Furoate Inhalation Powder in the Treatment of Persistent Asthma in Adults and Adolescents.

arms.label: Fluticasone Furoate OD and Placebo BID
Fluticasone Propionate BID and Placebo OD

summary: A randomised, double-blind, double-dummy, placebo controlled (with rescue medication), multicenter study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Fluticasone Furoate inhalation powder in the treatment of persistent asthma in adults and adolescents.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline in Clinic Visit Trough Evening (Pre-bronchodilator and Pre-dose) Forced Expiratory Volume in One Second (FEV1) at the End of the 24 Week Treatment Period
